name: Anuran Cauldron
notes: Each time you roll, +1 to your roll

name: Warworn Owlbear
notes: Item cards you play cannot be challenged

name: Orthus
notes: Each time you draw a Magic Card, you may play it immediately

name: Rex Major
notes: Each time you draw a Modifier Card, you may reveal it and draw a second card

name: Malamammoth
notes: Each time you draw an Item Card, you may play it immediately

name: Titan Wyvern
notes: Each time you roll for a Challenge card, +1 to your roll

name: Dark Dragon King
notes: Each time you roll for a Hero card's effect, +1 to your roll

name: Dracos
notes: Each time a Hero card in your party is destroyed, you may draw a card

name: Bloodwing
notes: Each time another player challenges you, that player must discard a card

name: Mega Slime
notes: You may spend an extra action point on each of your turns

name: Abyss Queen
notes: Each time another player plays a Modifier card on one of your rolls, +1 to your roll

name: Arctic Aries
notes: Each time you successfully roll to use a Hero Card's effect, you may draw a card

name: Corrupted Sabretooth
notes: Each time you would destroy a Hero card, you may steal that Hero card instead

name: Crowned Serpent
notes: Each time any player (including you) plays a Modifier card, you may draw a card

name: Terratuga
notes: Your Hero cards cannot be destroyed
